headline: 3 Reasons This High-Yield Stock Is a Great Buy Now
summary: This year, the market fell out of love with Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN).  Comparing Devon with one of its oil and gas exploration and production peers, Diamondback Energy (NASDAQ: FANG), helps to highlight one of the reasons why the market has turned against Devon.  The two companies started the year with comparable market caps; however, Diamondback's stock is up 16%, while Devon Energy's stock is down 15%.
